TopicTitle: Make a country and have it fought!

Articles.Content:
Here's how it works:

1. Say a random country name and it's location.

2. The next poster will declare their country, and invade yours in a creative way.

3. This continues until I say reset.

4. One rule: make your own country, don't say an already existing one.

I'll start.

Republic of Mudonia. Claims: south Idaho.

The Flaron Empire: Locations: All of Europe except Russia, UK , Portugal, Spain, France, Sweden and Norway.

I Use 3 Orbital Doomsday Nuclear weapon satelites and aim at Idaho, Then I fire the first one and destroys your capital and I fire the second satelitte on your most populated city in a fantastic Nuclear Blast, Then leaving your cities in nuclear ruins.

The third Satelitte is jammed and It falls out of orbit and hits Former-Netherlands territory, Which completely wipes the Netherlands off the map, And that my friends. Is war karma.

As the Community Rules state, roleplaying is prohibited on the forums.

If you wish to play such games, please take them elsewhere.
